title: Captain America
description: The next chapter of Captain America's journey as Sam Wilson dons the shield to face new global threats.

title: Sinners
description: A dark psychological thriller exploring guilt, redemption, and the secrets people hide.

title: Mickey 17
description: A disposable employee on a human expedition sent to colonize an ice world refuses to let his replacement clone take over.

title: Thunderbolts*
description: A group of anti-heroes and reformed villains are assembled for a secret government mission in the Marvel Universe.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: Ethan Hunt returns for another globe-trotting mission filled with espionage, action, and impossible stunts.

title: 28 Years Later
description: The next installment in the post-apocalyptic horror saga continues to explore the terrifying aftermath of viral outbreak.

title: F1
description: A high-octane sports drama set in the world of Formula 1 racing, produced by Brad Pitt.

title: Superman
description: A fresh reboot of the Superman franchise as Clark Kent navigates his dual identity in a new DC Universe.

title: The Fantastic Four
description: Marvel's iconic superhero team makes their MCU debut, facing cosmic threats and scientific mysteries.

title: Wicked: For Good
description: A cinematic adaptation of the hit Broadway musical, exploring the untold story of the witches of Oz.
